thread.section_title: Ticketmaster Resale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ticketmaster Resale | resale.ticketmaster.com.au | 3 of 79
thread.title: Karen

author: Karen
title: Karen
text:
This is the first time I have listed tickets on Ticketmaster resale. The whole process was easy to do. I would recommend it. Having said that Given the new buyer paid immediately for the tickets and ticketmaster reissued them I do not understand why the seller waits for 10 days after the show runs.
I think this needs review. Ebay sales have been smooth sailing with immediate payment.
Overall very good.
